item.title: Report X-2024050117
item.description:
Report X-2024050117

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-07T15:13:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-27
  • City: LATHAM
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS NOTIFIED OF A LEAKING PACKAGE ON THE YELLOW BELT. RESPONDER DONNED PPE WITH SILVER SHIELD LINERS. IDENTIFIED LEAKER AS A CORROSIVE HAZMAT. CLEANED AREA USING SODIUM BICARBONATE AND SPEEDY DRY. PLACED IN A GREEN LINED SPILL TRAY AND TRANSPORTED TO DMP CAGE FOR PROESSING.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 04/24/2024 hidden dangerous goods were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the DHL Express UC facility, located at 12-12 33rd Avenue, Long Island City, NY 11106. Transportation by road has been confirmed. ' Shipment also contains UN1950 Aerosols, flammable Class 2.1 Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Packaging Type: Receptacle Material of Construction: Meta Package Capacity: 227 g Amount in Package: 227 g Number in Shipment 2 Number Failed: 2
